titleStmt.title: Loyalty amongst rebels the true royalist, or, Hushay the Archite, a happy counsellour in King David's greatest danger / written by Edward Wolley ...
titleStmt.author: Wolley, Edward, 1603-1684.

notesStmt.note: Second part has title: The parallel betwixt King Charles the II, King of England and Lewis the IV, the French king.
Imperfect: print showthrough with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
